metadata.synopsis: Behaviour AD for the music vendor at the music store.

0.speaker: Thomas C. Quirkilious
0.text: Lute, lyre, drum - all handcrafted by yours truly.
0.context: NodeContext: gently calling out from his storefront - proud, eager, but not over the top

1.speaker: Thomas C. Quirkilious
1.text: Every instrument has the Quirkilious seal of approval.
1.context: NodeContext: gently calling out from his storefront - proud, eager, but not over the top

2.speaker: Thomas C. Quirkilious
2.text: Peruse the finest artisanal instruments in all of Baldur's Gate.
2.context: NodeContext: gently calling out from his storefront - proud, eager, but not over the top

3.speaker: Thomas C. Quirkilious
3.text: Any musical questions? Don't hesitate to ask!
3.context: NodeContext: gently calling out from his storefront - proud, eager, but not over the top
